(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (ClassDeclaration 
        (ClassBody 
          (MethodDefinition 
            (TypeAnnotation 
              (TypeIdentifier "Int")) 
            (StatementBlock) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "foo") 
            (FormalParameters) 
            (AccessibilityModifier "public"))) 
        (TypeIdentifier "Foo")))))
